div.p: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

In 10 years, I imagine I'll have a good job in clinical research. Maybe, I'll be in another country, perhaps Canadian why not or Dubai ? I imagine I will be married and I will have some children. I would like 3 children and live in a beautiful appartment. And for my work, I think I will have more responsabilities and I'll do a lot of studies and test a lot of new medicine. If I'll do more research, I would like to work on a treatment fot cancer or HIV.
